Keyword.Message: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Keyword.Name: core

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has started adding a cache element.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HashCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="KeySize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="KeyData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="KeySize"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has stopped adding a cache element.

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: Could not construct a font cache element due to a malformed key.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Type" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HashCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="KeySize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="KeyData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="KeySize"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MessageSize"/> <data name="MessageAttributesSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MessageAttributesData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="MessageAttributesSize"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The prefetch file is corrupt and will be recreated.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has started creating a cache context.

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has stopped creating a cache context.

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has started updating the system font collection.

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service has stopped updating the system font collection.

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service opened a font file.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service closed a font file.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Keyword: Event originating from the FontCache service.
Event.Message: The font cache service performed an access check on a font file.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HRESULT" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FileName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
